name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a robust skill set in **Spring Boot**, **Kubernetes**, **AWS**, **Terraform**, and **CloudFormation**, enabling me to design and implement scalable microservices and RESTful APIs. I possess a strong understanding of Infrastructure-as-Code principles, ensuring efficient and reliable deployment processes. My experience in Agile methodologies, including Scrum and Kanban, allows for effective collaboration in fast-paced environments.
In addition to my technical prowess, I have a solid foundation in data modeling and problem-solving, making me adept at meeting diverse project requirements. My commitment to mentoring and guiding junior developers strengthens team performance and promotes knowledge sharing.
With a comprehensive background in building high-performance solutions, I have worked on enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate advanced technologies, and my expertise extends to integrating AI/ML capabilities. I have a proven track record in CI/CD automation and developing machine learning pipelines using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
